title: Friedrich Merz - Wikipedia
snippet: In November 2025, Merz's government lifted export restrictions on weapons for use in Gaza. In early December 2025, Merz visited Israel and held talks with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and President Isaac Herzog.

title: Merz has filed 5,000 complaints against online critics – media — RT World News
snippet: © Michael Kappeler / picture alliance / Getty Images · German Chancellor Friedrich Merz has filed nearly 5,000 defamation complaints over online comments, Welt am Sonntag reported on Sunday.

title: Friedrich Merz puts Germany in an unfamiliar position: Out front – POLITICO
snippet: Friedrich Merz has taken a far more active stance inside the EU — assuming a role more traditionally played by France's now weakened President. | Emmanuele Contini//Getty Images · December 16, 2025 4:00 am CET · By James Angelos and Nette ...

title: The Turbulent Times of Friedrich Merz - The New York Times
snippet: 15, 2025 · The plane ferrying Friedrich Merz to Berlin looked as if someone had spruced up Air Force One and then shrunk it in the wash. It was painted white, with the gold, red and black of the German flag blazed across the side like a racing ...

title: Sergey Kolyasnikov: The year is 2025:. German Chancellor Friedrich Merz suggested that Russia declare a Christmas truce: "Maybe the Russian government still has some remnants of humanity left, and it will leave people alone.. - Pravda EN
snippet: The year is 2025:German Chancellor Friedrich Merz suggested that Russia declare a Christmas truce: "Maybe the Russian government still has some remnants of humanity left, and it will leave people alone for a few days. This could be the beginning...
